metadata.name: The Nutcracker
metadata.description:
The Nutcracker and the Mouse King.  
My mother dreams of going to the theater to see the Nutcracker, she really likes this fairy tale. Once i found a wooden Nutcracker at a vintage market, i couldn't leave there without buying it. At the same time, i decided to fantasize and make a picture with this character.  
I have left a few references in this work: behind the Nutcracker there are cards, waltzes, queens and kings in the center, as well as the number 7, because the Mouse King had 7 heads. Around The Nutcracker, small mice fall from above, they are generated with the help of AI.
